phrases.phrase:
Choose the dice to roll.
The following systems are available:
Activates the dice roller with all available systems in this node.
All systems can be used in this forum
All available systems that can be rolled

A PHP callback class which has as the first parameter the roll information, and as the second parameter an array of options.

Callback signature:

static (array &$roll, array $options)

Arguments:

  1. array &$roll - Roll information. You may modify existing ones or add your own values here.
  2. array $options - .
Do you want to delete the die?
Do you want to delete the following rule?
Count all winning dice. With exploding dice, this can be higher than the rolled dice.

Maximum number of dice that can be rolled.
Note: The maximum number of dice that can be rolled is limited in the rule settings.
List of dice in the system
Give the rule a name so that you can easily find this system configuration again.
You can roll dice in this forum.
When this die is deactivated, it can no longer be used in making rolls. Old rolls that used this die will still be shown correctly.
Enter the path to an image here. This image will be used to display the value of the die after it has been rolled.

The die you specified was not found.
Did it roll under the table?

How many sides does this die have?
We are not bound by physical limitations here!
Give a tag (or abbreviation) that is used to clearly identify the die. E.g. D6, or d
Give the roll a nice name. This is the name of the die that will be displayed alongside the value of the die when a roll is made.

You can enter the possible values for the sides of the die here. If left blank, the standard 1 to the total number of sides is used.
Possible options are comma separated values, ranges, or a combination of these.
Example:
1-20: The die has ONE side with a value of 1, ONE side with a value of 2, ..., and ONE side with a value of 20
1-10,1-10: The die has TWO sides with a value of one, TWO sides with a value of 2, ..., and TWO sides with a value of 10
5*2,5*4,9*10,20: The die has FIVE sides with a value of 2, FIVE sides with a value of 4, NINE sides with a value of 10 and ONE side with a value of 20
The order in which the systems are displayed in the 'Roll Dice' menu.
Please select the maximum number of dice.
Please select the minimum number of dice.
Simply click on the "Roll Dice" button beneath the editor.

This die will be deleted from all systems.
Perhaps deactivation is a better option.

When deleting this rule, some systems may not function correctly any more.
Systems that use this rule, won't follow any rules any more. Previous rolls may stop showing correctly.
Warning: When you delete the system, results will no longer be shown correctly.
The system you are trying to import already exists.

You have installed the Addon Social Groups by Waindigo.
You can also install my Social Dice AddOn (Will be released shortly).
The XML data does not contain a valid rule.
The XML data does not contain a valid system.
You have loaded an invalid system XML.

You have selected messages with a total of {count} rolls.
When the message is posted in a forum which does not support the rolling of dice, all {count} dice rolls will be deleted.
No system has been created yet.
You are not allowed to see the results of this roll.
You haven't made a roll yet.
You haven't made any rolls yet..
This rule is not used by any system. It can be deleted without risk.
Please enter a valid tag. Only letters (a-z) and numbers (0-9) are allowed.
This rule is protected and can't be edited.

You can't delete this protected system.
It is needed as a basic set for making any rolls at all.

This system has been protected.
You can alter only some of the fields.
Do you really want to delete this dice roll?
Choose the type and number of dice you want to throw
Can't find the corresponding rule. Please check if the rule has already been imported.
Enter a short identification tag for the rule. Only letters (a-z) and numbers (0-9) are allowed.
Save Forum and apply to child forums
Only the selected systems can be used

Sort ascending
If you need the roll order for exploding dice, leave this option deactivated.
Add the values of all dice
Don't add the values of all dice
Add the values of the winning dice
Add the winning dice and the exploding dice, including the next rolls
A tag should contain more characters than just numbers..

You must turn on the wireset System to use them.

You can turn on them in the Settings.
Select the systems that can be used on this forum.
Give a short description of the game that the system applies to. E.g. the Dark Eye (Das Schwarze Auge), Dungeons & Dragons, or Savage Worlds.
Enter the path to an image for the system here. This image will only be shown in the ACP.
Maximum amount of dice per roll.
What is the maximum amount of dice that may be rolled?
Minimum amount of dice per roll
What is the minimum amount of dice that may be rolled?
How many options (0-8) can this system have?
Give the system a short identification tag. Only letters (a-z) and numbers (0-9) are allowed. E.g. DSA, D20, D6
Give the system a cool name.
Your roll {roll} in your message in the thread {title} was deleted.

You can't make a roll right here or right now.
Perhaps your time is up?
Currently no die is rolled in this Post.

At these locations you can roll dice.
You can make detailed configurations in the User Groups.
Collapse the roll in the post

This option controls the collapsing of dice rolls in forum posts.
By default, only the end results is directly visible.
Clicking on the result will allow the user to see the individual dice.
This option can save a lot of space. But to obtain details, the user must click on the results.
Activate this Option, to display Mods, who are set in parent Forums.
Enable this option when importing rolls from my old vBulletin AddOn.

Enable the control panel when you want to create a key.

This software key was created from Hoffi's Server. If it doesn't work, contact Hoffi at XenForo.com or XenDACH.de.
It will only transfer the AddOn, the domain and the server IP to the service. If the connection fails, this won't lead to restrictions. The AddOn also functions without a key.
Here you can configure the maximum number of rolls that can be made in one post.

Here you can configure the maximum number of dice that can be used in one post .
A system can have a lower number, but not a higher one.

Users that are in the following Usergroups won't be set a Piwik Tracking Code.
So you can cut out your Team and/r Administrators from tracking.
Select some Details, that shown up on the Piwik Main Page inside the ACP.
View any dice roll in post
You can specify the display of the dice results inside the message.
Change the look of the exploded die.
Change the look of the winning die
Format the display with the default background image, if no special is specified.

Be careful, this can actually add a lot of querys. In a later versions this will be optimized.
Actually disabled until next version...
If you activate this, and in the forum is roll dice allowed, a small Icon will indicate this.
Specify how the Node Icon appears
Here is specified, how the Code looks.
format the area for a complete roll of a wireset
Formats the result of the complete wireset in the message

property.title: Show Die Icon
property.description: If you activate this, and in the forum is roll dice allowed, a small Icon will indicate this.

property.title: Die Display
property.description: Format the display with the default background image, if no special is specified.

property.title: Roll Display
property.description: format the area for a complete roll of a wireset

property.title: Wireset Heading
property.description: Formats the result of the complete wireset in the message

property.title: Winning Die
property.description: Change the look of the winning die

property.title: Exploding Die
property.description: Change the look of the exploded die.

property.title: Node Icon
property.description: Specify how the Node Icon appears

property.title: Display Icon in Message List
property.description:
Be careful, this cann actually add a lot of querys. In a leter Version this will be optimized.
Actually disabled until next version...

group.title: Dice Manager
group.description: You can specify the display of the dice results inside the message.

modification.replace: <xen:if is="{$xenOptions.dice_roll_in.thread} AND {$forum.allow_diceroll}"> <input type="button" href="{xen:link dice-thread/roll-thread, $forum}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-target="dice-info" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_roll_dice}" /> </xen:if> $0

<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.dice_roll_in.thread} AND {$forum.allow_diceroll}"> <input type="button" href="{xen:link dice-thread/roll-thread, $forum}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-target="dice-info" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_roll_dice}" /> </xen:if> $0

<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.dice_roll_in.quickreply} AND {$thread.canRollDice}"> <input type="button" href="{xen:link 'dice-roll/roll-post', $thread}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-target="dice-info" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_roll_dice}" /> </xen:if> $0
